Sector.Name: Glimmerdrift Reaches
Glimmerdrift
Sector.Credits: Glimmerdrift Reaches sector was designed by Marc W. Miller and appears in Atlas of the Imperium (GDW, 1984). It was refined by Martin J. Dougherty and Hunter Gordon and appears in Gateway to Destiny (QuikLink Interactive, 2006). Glimmerdrift Reaches sector 1248 borders designed by Shane MacLean, Eric O'Dell and Michael Taylor and appears in 1248 Sourcebook 1: Out of Darkness(ComStar Media/Avenger Enterprises, 2006).

Product.Author: Martin J. Dougherty
Product.Title: 1248 Sourcebook 1: Out of Darkness
Product.Publisher: Avenger Enterprises in association with Comstar Media, LLC.
